title: 238. Q&AF: Maintaining Standards, Seeing The Future & Business Trends
itunes:title: 238. Q&AF: Maintaining Standards, Seeing The Future & Business Trends
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on maintaining standards once you have established them, whether vision is something we develop or something we are born with, and which trends you SHOULD & SHOULD NOT follow in business.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on maintaining standards once you have established them, whether vision is something we develop or something we are born with, and which trends you SHOULD & SHOULD NOT follow in business.
